channel.title: Non-Original Weapon World Models Not Showing in TF2 Listen Server.
channel.description:
When I create a Listen server, I cannot see my friend's non-original weapons and he could not see mine.
Another thing is, I cannot load my weapon\hat load out. It shows that I have the items in the equipped boxes but even after I kill myself or use the supplies locker it does not change to that load out. This bug does not apply to my friend.
Sorry if I am asking at the wrong place.
